sentences.sContent: Though she’s almost 40, she still plans to compete.
sentences.sCn: 尽管已经快40岁了，她仍然打算参加比赛。

sentences.sContent: Pascal went ahead with the experiment even though he knew it was dangerous.
sentences.sCn: 虽然帕斯卡知道这个试验很危险，但他仍然进行下去。

phrases.pCn: 走过；排练；经历；从头到尾地阅读

trans.tranOther: used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected
